data.message:
I love Jim Carrey.
I would have never known.
Thank you Marshall for sharing.
I know it sounds crazy, but you are like a mentor to me.
I've done a lot in life that I'm not proud of, but I try to do the best I can.
If it wasn't for you and your music, I probably wouldn't be here today.
I would love to be given an opportunity to talk to you or to just be able to shake your hand, would be a dream come true.

replies.message: Dear Slim, I wrote you but you still ain't callin...
I do sound like Stan don't I...just got the wrong parts, "and I'm still standing here screaming fuck the free world..."
